greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers n such that n is a substring of 6^n.
mathematica: Select[Range[250],SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[6^#],IntegerDigits[#]]>0&] (* Requires Mathematica version 10 or later *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 03 2018 *)
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
